title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Inception
description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal their secrets must plant an idea into a CEO's mind.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as The Joker wreaks havoc and chaos, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
